articles.author: Jeff Fletcher
articles.title: Tigers’ Tarik Skubal wins AL Cy Young again - BBWAA
articles.description: Left-hander Tarik Skubal of the Detroit Tigers won the American League Cy Young award for the second straight season. Skubal becomes the 23rd pitcher to win multiple Cy Young Awards. The list features seven-time winner Roger Clemens; five-time winner Randy Jo…
articles.content:
Left-hander Tarik Skubal of the Detroit Tigers won the American League Cy Young award for the second straight season.
